Binaural Recordings with Claudia Graziadei's Singing Workshops at Ocean Space, San Lorenzo, Venice

I captured the amazing blend of voice, breath and space (massive reverberation) with a dummy-head created by Riccardo Farnea with my binaural DPA4060s.
